text: Ara yadi tomara akara ingite se narira biyera payagama da'o, kimba nijedera mane gopana rakha, tabe tate'o tomadera kona papa ne'i, allaha janena ye, tomara abasya'i se naridera katha ullekha karabe. Kintu tadera sathe biye karara gopana pratisruti diye rekho na. Abasya sariyatera nirdharita pratha anuyayi kona katha sabyasta kare nebe. Ara nirdharita iddata samapti paryaye na ya'oya abadhi biye karara kona iccha karo na. Ara ekatha jene rekho ye, tomadera mane ye katha rayeche, allahara ta jana ache. Kaje'i tamke bhaya karate thaka. Ara jene rekho ye, allaha ksamakari o dhairyyasila.
